data.name: Collisus
data.detailed_description:
Collisus will be the Ultimate Gun-Fu Simulator. Shoot, Grab, Execute your way through hundreds of enemies with an (upcoming) wide range of martial arts moves and an arsenal of modifiable guns. The 360 Aim & Gun-Fu system has GameDevDave's total devotion to perfect it to a standard never seen before in shooters.



Features:
Gun-Fu Action
Gritty Atmosphere & Gore
Incredibly Smooth Controls
Shop & Verdict Score Systems
Upgrades, Unlockables & Items
Custom Game Music System
Ultra Graphics Quality Setting
4K Resolution and Shadows
Dialogue, Lore & References

Upcoming:
Background Aim
Over-The-Shoulder Aim
Quick Angle Switch
More Gun-Fu moves
Cover System
Quick Kills
Parkour
Smarter Enemies
Hostage System
Secondary + Rifle Sling
More Weapons & Weapon Mods
Character Customization
Campaign Mode
Director System
Music System

See the full roadmap here:
https://steamcommunity.com/app/1531010/discussions/0/6303323544997689481/

Social:
Active Community, Support & Feedback
Access to Discord Channel
Full Communication with Developer

data.short_description: Collisus will be the Ultimate Gun-Fu Simulator with a 2.5D Gun-Fu system as the marvel of this game developed to perfection to set a standard never seen before in shooters.
data.reviews:
“Collisus is a game inspired by John Wick. And the sole purpose of that game is to make you feel as badass as Keanu Reeves. Whether that will work remains to be seen, but since the game has not even reached version 1.0, development is clearly still underway.”
GameQuarter

“Looks like Keanu Reeves as Max Payne. The game is still in early access but it's got potentials and still needs more content added to the game.”
Made For Gamers

“An interesting two-dimensional wave action with elements of gun fu and various power-ups. Lots of enemies and addictive gameplay.”
Gold Bear Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Controller Recommended
